column4: Can't boot ubuntu CD getting black screen after selecting run/install ubuntu....anyone?
i had a lot of trouble with the liveCD myself
did you get the "loading bar" for a while?

that sucks, i at least had it working well enough to get to the installer, i'm hoping it'll behave better once it's installed, but right now it really seems like gutsy is having some major hardware compatibility problems, never had any problems like this with feisty
